text.en: How amazing!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: In the completely pure dharmadhātu realm,
text.en-trans: chöying nampar dakpé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the palace of the unborn pure dharmakāya,
text.en-trans: kyemé chöku dakpé podrang né

text.en: Dharmakāya Samantabhadra, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: chöku kuntuzangpo la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the unborn Dharma body!
text.en-trans: kyemé chöku tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the Densely Ornamented Unexcelled pure realm,
text.en-trans: womin tukpo köpé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the mirror-like palace of utterly pure ignorance,
text.en-trans: timuk namdak melong podrang né

text.en: Buddha Vairocana, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: sangye nampar nang dzé la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the complete purity of ignorance!
text.en-trans: timuk namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the eastern pure realm, Profound Great Joy,
text.en-trans: sharchok ngönpar gawé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the palace of the emptiness of utterly pure anger,
text.en-trans: zhedang namdak tongnyi podrang né

text.en: Buddha Vajrasattva, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: sangye dorjé sempa la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the complete purity of anger!
text.en-trans: zhedang namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the southern pure realm, Glorious Beauty,
text.en-trans: lhochok palden dzepé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the palace of the equality of utterly pure pride,
text.en-trans: ngagyal namdak nyamnyi podrang né

text.en: Buddha Ratnasambhava, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: sangye rinchen jungden la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the complete purity of pride!
text.en-trans: ngagyal namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the western pure realm of bliss, Sukhāvatī,
text.en-trans: nubchok dewachen gyi zhingkham su

text.en: Within the palace of the discrimination of utterly pure desire,
text.en-trans: döchak namdak sortok podrang né

text.en: Buddha Amitābha, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: sangye nangwa tayé la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the complete purity of desire!
text.en-trans: döchak namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the northern pure realm, Utterly Perfect Activity,
text.en-trans: jangchok lerab dzokpé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the all-accomplishing palace of utterly pure jealousy,
text.en-trans: trakdok namdak ja drub podrang né

text.en: Buddha Amoghasiddhi, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: sangye dön yö drubpa la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the complete purity of jealousy!
text.en-trans: trakdok namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: The eight bodhisattvas, thousand and two buddhas,
text.en-trans: sempa gyé dang sangye tong tsa dang

text.en: Eight bodhi-ladies, and all such others—
text.en-trans: sem ma gyé sok longku tulkü zhing

text.en: Buddhas and bodhisattvas of nirmāṇakāya and sambhogakāya realms, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: sangye changsem nam la solwa deb

text.en: Bless my mindstream and liberate the mindstreams of others!
text.en-trans: dak gyü jin lab zhen gyü drolwa dang

text.en: Grant your blessings that awakened activity may spread and pervade the ten directions!
text.en-trans: trinlé chok chur gyepar jingyi lob

text.en: Perfect embodiment of all sugatas of the three times—
text.en-trans: dü sum deshek tamché chikdü pé

text.en: Venerable guru Precious Lotus;
text.en-trans: jetsün guru pema rinpoche

text.en: Eight teachers from the noble land; Lady Tsogyal, only mother;
text.en-trans: lobpön gyé dang ma chik tsogyalma

text.en: Lotsawas, paṇḍitas, lord and subjects—to all of you, I pray!
text.en-trans: lo pen jebang nam la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings that by perfecting generation and completion, and actualizing the subtle channels and winds,
text.en-trans: kyedzok tarchin tsalung ngöngyur né

text.en: I may attain the siddhi of immortality
text.en-trans: chimé tsé yi ngödrub tob né su

text.en: And accomplish the rainbow body in this very life!
text.en-trans: tsé dir jalü drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Succession of Dharma kings, great and minor tertöns,
text.en-trans: chögyal rim jön terchen tertren dang

text.en: Vidyādhara gurus of the oral and treasure lineages,
text.en-trans: kater gyüpé lama rigdzin sok

text.en: All gurus of all the traditions of India and Tibet––to all of you, I pray!
text.en-trans: gya bö rimé lamar solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings that pure perception and diligence arise!
text.en-trans: daknang tsöndrü kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: In the sambhogakāya realm, teacher Vajrasattva;
text.en-trans: longkü zhing du tönpa dorjé sem

text.en: The Muni’s śrāvaka-listeners; mighty Vajrapāṇi;
text.en-trans: tubpé nyentö lak na dorjé dang

text.en: At the feet of Padmasambhava, bodhisattva Murup Tsenpo;
text.en-trans: pejung drung du gyalsé mu rub tsen

text.en: Supreme Sangye Lingpa, sovereign of profound treasures;
text.en-trans: zabter ngadak sangye lingpa chok

text.en: Re-emanation vidyādhara, Mingyur Dorje;
text.en-trans: yangtrul rigdzin mingyur dorjé dang

text.en: Chokgyur Lingpa, vidyādhara of the special line of Guru Drakpo;
text.en-trans: gu drak kabab rigdzin chokgyur ling

text.en: And future treasure-revealers Drimé Künden
text.en-trans: ma ong tertön drimé künden dang

text.en: And Sangye Möpachen—to all of you, I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye möpachen la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings that all connections may be beneficial!
text.en-trans: dreltsé dön dang denpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings, assembly of vidyādhara gurus!
text.en-trans: jingyi lob shik lama rigdzin tsok

text.en: Vidyādhara Sangye Lingpa, dispel all obstacles!
text.en-trans: barché sol chik rigdzin sangye ling

text.en: Mighty Mingyur Dorje, grant the siddhis!
text.en-trans: ngödrub tsol chik mingyur dorjé tsal

text.en: Vidyādhara Chokgyur Lingpa, expand the activities of awakening!
text.en-trans: trinlé gyé shik rigdzin chokgyur ling

text.en: Most gracious noble gurus, bestow your blessings
text.en-trans: khyé kyi jedzin bulob dakchak la

text.en: Upon us, disciples embraced within your care, I beseech you!
text.en-trans: jingyi lob shik drinchen lama jé

text.en: Help us attain awakening within this very life!
text.en-trans: tsé chik sangye drubpar dzé du sol
